document_data.name: ''The Healing Power of Prayer: Curative Rituals of the House of Ilmater''
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Healing Power of Prayer: Curative Rituals of the House of Ilmater''''' was a medicinally oriented religious text centered around various [[Ilmatari]] ritual practices.
document_data.Description: Copies of this book were bound in leather of an [[ivory]] hue.
document_data.Contents: Among the contents of the book was a chapter entitled "Lycanthropy and Other Magical Diseases and Curses".
document_data.Notable Owners: * [[Steif|Father Steif]], an Ilmatari [[priest]] in the 14{{th}} century [[DR]], owned a copy of this book and was using it to help him in his experimental effort to cure himself of the [[disease]] of [[lycanthropy]] solely through [[prayer]].
